snippet: President Uhuru Kenyatta’s request to participate by video link in his trial on charges of crimes against humanity was rejected.
abstract: Judges reject Kenyan Pres Uhuru Kenyatta's request to participate by video link in his trial on charges of crimes against humanity at the International Criminal Court in The Hague, but allow him to be absent from several hours of the proceedings; ruling removes argument that trial will seriously impede his ability to function as president.
lead_paragraph: President Uhuru Kenyatta’s request to participate by video link in his trial on charges of crimes against humanity was rejected.

headline.main: Kenyan Leader Can Skip Parts of Hague Trial
headline.print_headline: Kenyan Leader Can Skip Parts of Hague Trial

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
